HOW TO PUT SUBS (SIMPLE!)
1.Download from subscene or divxsubtitles or subdownloader
2.Unzip them
3.Create a folder and put them inside with the video you want
4.Rename them and give them the name of your video but do not remove the .srt in the end
like this ---> video name= Prison Break - 101 - Pilot.avi   subtitles name= Prison Break - 101 - Pilot.srt
5.Enjoy

Helm me please, I don`t get the movie only the sound I have tried VLC media player and Windows media player??


You have to install some sort of dvd-decoder... I use Nero, so I install the MPEG2DVD-decoder, but there are many other dvd-decoder plugins or codeks. That is what causing you to have to audio, it's missing or not installed.
